title: Even Money
description: Sometimes it only takes a minute. A connection of eyes across a room, a quickened heartbeat, and everything changes.I was a cocktail waitress with a fondness for partying and meaningless sex. He owned half of Vegas, with the reputation to match. I should have turned away. Instead, I stepped closer.Then, the lies started.Rumors spread.Stalking commenced.And someone died. None of it stopped me from falling in love.*This is book 1 in a duet. The second book, Double Down, will release on June 18th or 25th.*
author: Alessandra Torre
